modules.fullstateprocessing.FullStateProcessing module¶

class modules.fullstateprocessing.FullStateProcessing.CeilingUnlimitedMigration(proc_matrix, dev_matrix, dev_weights)¶

Bases: FullStateProcessing

processing()¶
class modules.fullstateprocessing.FullStateProcessing.CeilingUnlimitedMigrationWithRetainedState¶

Bases: FullStateProcessing

class modules.fullstateprocessing.FullStateProcessing.FullStateProcessing¶

Bases: object

Parameters:

  • nodes – nodes have multiple resources.

  • applications – application have a multi-resource request.

Constraints: - Global Device Resources : The cumulative application deployment cannot exceed to globally available resources - Local Device Resources : On each device, the application parts deployed cannot exceed the devices’ available resources. - Application Integrity : For each application, each process is deployed once and only once on the infrastructure - Application Integrity : For each application, either all process are deployed, or none.

Input: Matrix:

size_1 : num_app*3(=max_num_proc)*4(num_resources) of 1s and 0s. size_2 : num_devices

Output: Values : 1s and 0s.

1 : deploy proc on device 0 : don’t

Constraints: Sum value on a column is 1 : proc deployed there sum value on a column is 0 : no proc deployed, error or no proc in this slot for this app 3-by-3 column sum, 0 (no app deployed) or num_proc (app deployed)
